flc.nbl_actors.core

Class ActorBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • flc.nbl_actors.core.ActorBase<T>

  • public class ActorBase<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Actor base class.

    Provides self() actor reference, initiated by calling init(). Override init() to access the thread factory instance, or to add constructor code, but remember to call super.init() and return self(). 

    
 Minimum example:
     static void actorBaseExample(IGreenThrFactory factory)
     {
         class Impl extends ActorBase<Impl> {
             void otherMethod(String message) {
                 System.out.println(message + ": done!");
             }
             void someMethod(String message) {
                 this.self().send(a -> a.otherMethod(message));
             }
         }
         IActorRef<Impl> ref = new Impl().init(factory);
         ref.send(a -> a.someMethod("message"));
     }
    Date: 18.07.13

    • Method Detail

      • become

        protected void become(T newImpl)
        Become - update my self() reference to a new actor implementation. (No explicit initiation via init() or initThread(IGreenThr) is needed on the new instance)
        Parameters:
        newImpl - new actor implementation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if new implementation already has another self-reference != self()

      • init

        public IActorRef<T> init()
        Actor constructor. Equivalent to init(IGreenThrFactory) with ThreadContext.get().getFactory()
        Returns:
        new actor reference

      • init

        public IActorRef<T> init(IGreenThrFactory factory)
        Actor constructor. Equivalent to initThread(IGreenThr) with factory.newThread()
        Parameters:
        factory - thread factory
        Returns:
        new actor reference

      • initActorRef

        protected ActorRef<T> initActorRef(IGreenThr thr)
        Called internally from initThread(flc.nbl_actors.core.IGreenThr) to initialize 'self' actor reference. (Override to use a subclass of ActorRef.)
        Parameters:
        thr - thread
        Returns:
        Actor reference (or a subclass of it)

      • initThread

        public IActorRef<T> initThread(IGreenThr thr)
        Actor constructor.

        Attach a green-thread to this actor instance. To avoid shared mutable access, avoid direct method calls on this object from other threads. Instead, access it via returned actor reference.

        Parameters:
        thr - green thread
        Returns:
        new actor reference

      • newForkJoin

        Type Parameters:
        R - value type
        Parameters:
        initValue - initial value
        Returns:
        initiated ForkJoin

      • newThread

        public static IGreenThr newThread()
        Get a new Green thread. Equivalent to ThreadContext.get().getFactory().newThread()
        Returns:
        A new thread (from last set factory in ThreadContext)

      • self

        public IActorRef<T> self()
        Self reference - get the actor reference to this object.
        Returns:
        my actor reference
